title: StatementOfWorkData
description: Data schema for the Statement of Work (SOW) template - a formal document defining project scope, deliverables, and terms between a client and contractor

project_name.description: The name or title of the project being undertaken

client_name.description: The full legal name of the client organization or individual commissioning the work

contractor_name.description: The full legal name of the contractor or service provider performing the work

scope_of_work.description: Detailed multi-line description of the work to be performed, including objectives, tasks, and boundaries
scope_of_work.example:
Design and develop a modern e-commerce platform including:
- User authentication and account management
- Product catalog with search and filtering
- Shopping cart and checkout flow
- Payment gateway integration
- Admin dashboard for inventory management

deliverables.description: List of specific deliverables with their due dates

name.description: Name or description of the deliverable

due_date.description: Target completion date for this deliverable

timeline_start.description: The official start date of the project

timeline_end.description: The expected end date or deadline for project completion

payment_terms.description: Description of payment schedule and conditions
payment_terms.example: 50% upon signing, 25% at midpoint delivery, 25% upon final acceptance. Net 30 payment terms.

total_amount.description: Total contract value in dollars (displayed with $ prefix)

signature_date.description: The date the Statement of Work is signed by both parties

examples.scope_of_work:
Design and develop a modern e-commerce platform including:
- User authentication and account management
- Product catalog with search and filtering
- Shopping cart and checkout flow
- Payment gateway integration (Stripe)
- Admin dashboard for inventory management
- Mobile-responsive design
- Performance optimization for SEO
examples.payment_terms: 50% upon signing ($37,500), 25% at midpoint delivery ($18,750), 25% upon final acceptance ($18,750). Net 30 payment terms apply to all invoices.
